attributes.action: allow free prescriptions to include those on contributions based job seekers allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently it is possible to get free NHS prescriptions and other treatment when you are on income based JSA but not on contributions based. The implication being that the person in contributions based has more money than the person on income based, clearly since the amount rewarded is the same this cannot be the case.  There is in fact no guarantee they have any extra money. it is therefore requested that all unemployed persons have an equal right to access to treatment
